distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for openvpn fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-28882: Fix multiple exit notifications from authenticated clients will extend the validity of a closing session (bsc#1227546)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: OpenVPN from 2.6.0 through 2.6.10 in a server role accepts multiple exit notifications from authenticated clients which will extend the validity of a closing session
notes.title: CVE description
